DOC.brief_summary: The study investigate efficacy safety allogenous transplantation adipose-derived mesenchyma stem cell patient cerebellar ataxia .
DOC.brief_title: Treatment Cerebellar Ataxia With Mesenchymal Stem Cells
DOC.criteria: Patients diagnose spinocerebellar ataxia 3 ( SCA3 ) multiple system atrophycerebellar ( MSAC ) . Subject 's SARA score 10~20 point . Ages 20~70 year . Signed informed consent patient and/or guardian . Subjects enrol cell therapy study within past 30 day . Pregnancy test positive . Subjects deem suitable study investigator .
